content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in München to be a great place to live. So, what price were you thinking for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 500 Euros per month would be a good starting point.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than I was expecting. I'm looking for a price closer to 700 Euros per month. Is that something you would consider?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, I think 600 Euros per month would be a more reasonable price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 600 Euros is still quite a bit lower than what I'm asking. How about we meet in the middle at 650 Euros? That's a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: You are right, 650 Euros is a fair compromise. I agree to the price of [650] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment will be yours for 650 Euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
